workflow.name: Send predefined personalized emails to leads from Google Sheets using SendGrid
workflow.description:
## üìß What It Does
This n8n workflow sends **personalized marketing or outreach emails** using **predefined templates** stored in **Google Sheets**, with **SendGrid** as the email delivery provider.
Instead of relying on dynamic AI content, this setup selects a ready-made template and merges it with business-specific lead data ‚Äî delivering consistent and fast email personalization at scale.


## üí° Why This Workflow?
Sometimes, you don‚Äôt need the overhead or variability of AI-generated content. Predefined templates give you:
- ‚ö° **Faster execution** ‚Äî no calls to AI models
- üéØ **Total control** over tone, formatting, and structure
- üõ†Ô∏è **Easy customization** using variables like `[BusinessName]`, `[Location]`, etc.
- üí∞ **Zero additional cost per email**


## üë§ Who It‚Äôs For
- **Freelancers** or **Agencies** running outreach campaigns
- **Startups** or **SMBs** with lead data in Google Sheets
- Anyone who wants to automate email sending with **consistency, control, and low cost**.


## ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works
1. **Manual Trigger** starts the workflow.
2. **Google Sheets (Leads tab)** supplies a list of businesses with fields like name, location, email, category, etc.
3. Loop started to execute each item.
4. **Google Sheets (Email Template tab)** holds predefined subject and body templates (HTML supported).
5. A **random template** is selected for each email.
6. Placeholders like `[BusinessName]` or `[Category]` are replaced with actual lead info using the `Fix Variable` (Set) node.
7. The formatted message is sent via **SendGrid**, using your authenticated sender email.
8. A **1-second wait** is added between emails to manage rate limits and avoid spam flags.
9. Loop continues until all leads have been emailed.


## üõ† How to Set It Up
1. Import the `.json` file into your n8n instance.
2. Connect the required credentials:
   - **SendGrid API Key** (ensure sender domain and identity is verified)
   - **Google Sheets OAuth2**
3. Create or duplicate this [sample sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1UGarQNCplIfKKPSInxZlIC72oosZ45ul5jAQjYfpWrs/edit?usp=sharing), which contains two tabs and modify to your business interest:
   - `Leads`
   - `Email Template`
4. Update the leads and email templates to match your campaign.
5. Click **‚ÄúExecute Workflow‚Äù** to begin sending emails.


## üöÄ Want to Scale This?
Add additional workflows:
- üì¨ **SendGrid Webhook integration** to track status & engagements like bounces, opens, and clicks
- üîÅ **Reply tracker** via **Gmail** to update lead status
- ü§ñ **AI-based Email Router** to label replies as *Interested*, *Not Interested*, *Others*, **Forward emails** to appropriate department for further engagements.
- üìÜ **Follow-up Emails** (when there's no email reply) for D+5, D+10 days sequences


## üì¨ Need Help?
Feel free to reach out via email: [buzanalytics@gmail.com](mailto:buzanalytics@gmail.com)
Thanks for using this workflow

parameters.content:
## üìß Email Workflow with SendGrid & Predefined Email Templates
### ‚úâÔ∏è Using Predefined Templates
This workflow provides a **scalable and reliable** solution for sending **personalized** emails to clients using **SendGrid**.
If you prefer not to use an AI agent to generate dynamic email content, this approach is ideal. Here‚Äôs why:
- ‚ö° Faster Execution
- üéØ Consistency and Control 
- üí∞ Cost Efficiency

üí° You can always switch to an AI-based template generator later, depending on your workflow goals.

### üîß Setup Requirements
- **SendGrid API**
   -  Authenticate  also your domain and set up a sender identity
- **Google Sheets API**
   - Acts as your lightweight CRM
   - The Sheet should have **two tabs**:
      1. Leads
      2. Email Template


Click [Here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1UGarQNCplIfKKPSInxZlIC72oosZ45ul5jAQjYfpWrs/edit?usp=sharing) to download the Sample Google Sheets database used for this demo.

### üì¨ Contact 
#### For Enquiries: buzanalytics@gmail.com
Thank you for exploring this workflow!

## üß© Extend This Workflow Further
This workflow handles sending predefined, personalized emails to clients using **SendGrid**. To build a **complete email automation system**, you can integrate this with additional workflows and tools like **Gmail**, while ensuring proper setup of **SendGrid Webhook Events**.

To expand this workflow into a full email system, consider adding:
- üîÅ **Webhook** ‚Äì Tracks delivery status and engagement (opens, clicks, etc.)
- üóÇÔ∏è **Reply Updater** ‚Äì Updates your database when replies are received
- üß† **Email Routing** ‚Äì Uses AI to classify and label replies (e.g., Interested, Not Interested), forward Interested Replies to the appropriate department for further engagements
- üìÜ **Follow-Up Emails** ‚Äì Automates 5- and 10-day follow-up sequences

This modular design gives you flexibility to scale your outreach and track performance more effectively.

user.name: Ezema Kingsley Chibuzo
user.bio:
Data Analyst, Automation Developer, and AI Workflow Specialist with experience designing end-to-end systems using n8n and its integrations. I help businesses unlock insights, automate operations, and scale with custom AI-powered workflows, dynamic dashboards, and no-code tools. My work combines strong analytical thinking with smart automation ‚Äî from data collection and enrichment to lead generation, reporting, and AI agent orchestration.
